reviewText: vikku is the man....his sons kick serious percussive a** too...get this dvd....i learned a lot and listened a lot more!

Excellent DVD! Very professionally done. Clear, clean and great quality. A must for all percussionists.

Vikku ji really starts with the basics and builds upon them. The DVD is also constructed in chapters so that one can get to the desired topical material. The free PDF that can be located on web for this DVD is a must and an excellent resource.

This double DVD set was INCREDIBLE. Comprised of an amazing 1 hour concert and 2 hours of instruction, this DVD set blew me away!!! I would have paid double because it was totally worth it! The Language and Technique of South Indian Percussion-Presented by Vikku Vinayakram
